ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering skill increase
ygData.msgSnippet: my skill is up to 57 and I really haven t put much money into it, couple hundred, but I ve gotten most of it back by making cams  and selling them to fletchers
ygData.messageBody:
my skill is up to 57 and I really haven't put much money into it, couple
hundred, but I've gotten most of it back by making cams and selling them to
fletchers

Fixer, gnomish enchanter

> From: "Sean Dorsey" <sdorsey@...>
>
> I just did a Petition to a GM today, and after being shuffled around a
bit,
> I was able to bring up that I was a 29th level Gnome that has been
Tinkering
> for quite a while and had sunk over 100 plat into getting ONE tick, and I
> tought Tinkering skill was broke or messed up. He said he heard of cases
> that 10,000 Plat was needed to get a point, I kinda lost it there and
called
> EQ many names we can't say in public (but not to him, just to EQ, not a
good
> idea to piss of a Guide ;)
>
> So, I wanted to see if there were any Gnomes that did get their skill up,
> and if so how? You can check to see if your skill has moved from its base
> 50 by going to your skills and checking to see if it is still "Below
> Average" or not, as average stats at 51.
>
> Trying to find a pattern here, GM said Tinkering not broken, I say it is
> from what I have seen on my character, and from listening to others.
>
> Dass Swiftruner,
> Cazic-Thul
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
